message.body: Hey there!
Hi!
So... I know it's early but what's a good theme for a Halloween party?
I'm tempted to say Tim Burton movies...
Oohhh! That would be a fun one
Some of my ideas were Hitchcock films, twilight zone, horror movie villains, monsters from literature
Childhood nightmares, zombie dinner party
There's a bar crawl here around Halloween. Last year, I walked through it on the way home from work and saw an absolutely perfect Beetlejuice and Lydia.
Rocky horror picture show
80s big hair bands
Walking dead in Woodstock
Zombie dinner party sounds hilarious. Maybe I should steal that idea.
Where are you located?
You could get one of those brain jello molds and brain ice cube trays...
Rochester, NY. I'll see if anywhere carries those.
Party city or amazon.com
I'm in the suburbs or Philly
Thanks.
http://www.amazon.com/gp/aw/d/B000GKW6BU
http://www.amazon.com/gp/aw/d/B003XJLI9C
Thanks! I forwarded it to my e-mail.
http://foodbeast.com/content/2013/02/10/heres-how-to-throw-a-zombie-food-party/
http://thestir.cafemom.com/food_party/139086/7_zombieinspired_foods_to_eat
LOL. Awesome.
http://www.buzzfeed.com/emmachandler/horrifying-zombie-themed-treats-for-the-ultimate-w-8c4v?s=mobile
Gotta love the Internet
http://www.toptenz.net/top-10-zombie-costume-ideas.php
Tomorrow is my Friday
Yup. Man, I'm glad I'm old enough to remember looking things up without it. Any kids I have won't truly understand life without search engines.
Yep... My niece is 18 and has no idea what a card catalog is or what dial up is
Yay! Friday is my Friday, but the partners of the firm decided were having casual Thursdays all summer.
Damn it, I meant "we're". I need an editor. :-)
That's cool.. It's pretty casual all the time at my work
Wow. I didn't realize they got rid of card catalogs that long ago...
Eh.. Typos happen and auto correct sucks
Haha.. They might still have them but she never used them
